subject: Re: [junit] Re: Using System.out.println("something") ???
msgSnippet: ... Why do you want to log if you don t know what to log? Logging for the sake of logging? Do you want to do logging as a help for debugging? Then I d guess
messageBody:
On Monday 12 May 2003 15:35, javainsel wrote:
> We want to use logging but we have no idea what we should log in
> JUnit tests.

Why do you want to log if you don't know what to log?
Logging for the sake of logging?

Do you want to do logging as a help for debugging? Then I'd guess your
tests are too large or complex.


Robert
